thread.title: Girls devise a ridiculous trap to get a rat out of their house
thread.title_full: Girls devise a ridiculous trap to get a rat out of their house

author: Alex
title: Girls devise a ridiculous trap to get a rat out of their house
text:
Share on Facebook Share on Twitter + 
When a rat found its way into a house full of girls, the ladies devised a ridiculous trap to get the little guy out the door. 
The group built a makeshift barricade of buckets and brooms, then shooed the rat down the steps. There, a final girl waiting with a broom launched it out the front door like a hockey puck. We came up with this ridiculous plan to get this rat out of our house and IT ACTUALLY WORKED!!!! BYE BITCH pic.twitter.com/c5qW76mzP8 
â€” Jody Mackin (@jodeball4REALZ) February 17, 2017 
GOOOOALLL! 
The teamwork. The focus. The precision. The celebration. This video made me extremely happy. 
The internet agrees (though there were a few people who felt bad for the rat).
